title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 167.2 - Private bridge inventory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 167.2 - Private bridge inventory

State Regulations

Every county highway superintendent outside the City of New

York, shall inventory all private bridges located within their respective
jurisdictions in accordance with criteria outlined in section
167.3
of this Part. The City of

New York shall inventory all private bridges located within the City of New

York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
167.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
